name: send_group_message
description: Specify a target QQ group and the intended message goal. This tool helps you decide routing.

content.description: Message intent/summary. Write what you want to convey, not a literal template to be copied verbatim.

media_hints.description: Optional hints if the message should include media. Final sending still uses <resources> with routing prefixes.

source_hint.description: A hint of the file/url to use (may be omitted if unknown).
